results.original_title: Birds of Prey (and the Fantabulous Emancipation of One Harley Quinn)
results.overview: Harley Quinn joins forces with a singer, an assassin and a police detective to help a young girl who had a hit placed on her after she stole a rare diamond from a crime lord.
results.title: Birds of Prey (and the Fantabulous Emancipation of One Harley Quinn)

results.overview: A young man is torn between following in his brothers' footsteps or striking out on his own.
results.title: Bloodbrothers

results.overview: When a schoolteacher is sacked, he projects his bad mood at his troubled teenage son. The son, in turn, buys a CD player from a pawnshop with counterfeit money. This starts a chain reaction of misery as every victim projects his problems on to another person.
results.title: Frozen Land

results.overview: Fitzcarraldo is a dreamer who plans to build an opera house in Iquitos, in the Peruvian Amazon, so, in order to finance his project, he embarks on an epic adventure to collect rubber, a very profitable product, in a remote and unexplored region of the rainforest.
results.title: Fitzcarraldo

results.overview: On Saint Patrick's day—a night of wild parties and drunken revelry—three unlikely friends band together to save a college town from a vicious horde of body-snatching aliens.
results.title: Crawlers

results.overview: A young singer/songwriter, despite being married, becomes involved with her new guitarist, who she soon discovers has a dark past and may be a danger to her and those close to her.
results.title: Plush

results.overview: Filipino-American high school student Ben (Dante Basco) works in a comic book shop to earn money to pay his way into Cal Arts. His father, a postman, is determined that his son--who has won a pre-med scholarship to UCLA--will become a doctor. The eighteenth birthday party of Ben's sister, Rose, sets off a comedic and touching series of events and family struggles that will in turn determine young Ben's future. This fresh independent production from Gene Cajayon presents a lighthearted and warm coming-of-age tale filtered through the eyes of an American subculture rarely seen on film.
results.title: The Debut

results.overview: Natalia and Ginel leave their small Romanian Danube village to work abroad in Rotterdam. One evening, when she is assaulted after meeting a local, Natalia asks Ita, a friend from home turned into a crook, to help her.
results.title: Traffic

results.overview: A young woman explores love, compatibility and self-discovery during college, experiencing relationship complexities and personal growth.
results.title: The Girlfriend

results.overview: The emotional journey of Yulya, a fragile and precious young woman.
results.title: Yulya

results.overview: Prince Victor looks in vain for a swan which was wounded by one of his servants. Instead he discovers a beautiful girl with golden hair who has an arrow in her shoulder. She is dumb and can't explain her origin. He falls immediately for her. The girl quickly recovers, but disappears mysteriously.
results.title: Queen of the Lake

results.overview: Three teenage girls come of age while working at a pizza parlor in Mystic, Connecticut.
results.title: Mystic Pizza

results.overview: Honey Daniels dreams of making a name for herself as a hip-hop choreographer. When she's not busy hitting downtown clubs with her friends, she teaches dance classes at a nearby community center in Harlem, N.Y., as a way to keep kids off the streets. Honey thinks she's hit the jackpot when she meets a hotshot director casts her in one of his music videos. But, when he starts demanding sexual favors from her, Honey makes a decision that will change her life.
results.title: Honey

results.overview: A small band of resistance fighters battle the cyborgs that have taken control of the planet.
results.title: The Terminators

results.overview: After refusing a flower delivery, Regina’s cat disappears, unraveling her sense of reality. As strange encounters accumulate and familiar faces grow unrecognizable, she’s forced to confront unsettling truths about her mother, her memories, and herself. Regina is a surreal mystery about loss, identity, and the quiet collapse of control.
results.title: Regina

results.overview: Torch singer Helen Morgan rises from sordid beginnings to fame and fortune only to lose it all to alcohol and poor personal choices.
results.title: The Helen Morgan Story

results.overview: The year is 1939. The world is falling into chaos. Thousands of Poles, held by the Russians in a former monastery, are subjected to brutal indoctrination. An ambitious enemy agent makes it a point of honour to break the resistance of one of them. He is a young, world-famous pianist, respected by his fellow prisoners. His capitulation may result in winning many others over to the enemy's side. An insidious game begins, full of sophisticated manipulation, threats and promises. Can the young artist, a loving father and husband, win a duel with an agent backed by the power and perfidy of the Russian system?
results.title: Pojedynek

results.overview: A group of students become trapped inside a mysterious cave where they discover time passes differently underground than on the surface.
results.title: Time Trap

results.overview: When LexCorp accidentally unleashes a murderous creature, Superman meets his greatest challenge as a champion. Based on the "The Death of Superman" storyline that appeared in DC Comics' publications in the 1990s.
results.title: Superman: Doomsday

results.overview: A lady stripper and a gigolo promised each other that their work can't break them apart. But when lust and temptation come into the picture, they begin to question their vow.
results.title: Suki
